channel.title: myb transcriptional activator on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in myb transcriptional activator on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaMYB31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaMYB31 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Cap1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the MYB transcription factor MYB31 determine the evolution of extremely pungent peppers.

item.title: FaMYB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaMYB1 Gene Name: transcription factor MYB1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: The strawberry transcription factor FaMYB1 inhibits the biosynthesis of proanthocyanidins in Lotus corniculatus leaves.

item.title: GhMYB24
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMYB24 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB-like protein 24 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: A Cotton Gene Encoding MYB-Like Transcription Factor (GhMYB24) is Specifically Expressed in Pollen and is Involved in Regulation of Late Anther/Pollen Development.

item.title: MYB31
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MYB31 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor Cap1 Genome: Species: Capsicum chinense Functional Descriptions: Natural variations in the MYB transcription factor MYB31 determine the evolution of extremely pungent peppers.

item.title: OsFLP
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os07g43420 RAPdb gene ID: Os07g0627300 Gene Symbol: OsFLP Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: OsMYB4P
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os11g35390 RAPdb gene ID: Os11g0558200 Gene Symbol: OsMYB4P Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PpERF105
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpERF105 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus pyrifolia Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-activated PpERF105 induces the expression of the repressor-type R2R3-MYB gene PpMYB140 to inhibit anthocyanin biosynthesis in red pear fruit.

item.title: PpMYB140
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Pbr000876.1 Gene Symbol: PpMYB140 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Pyrus pyrifolia Functional Descriptions: Ethylene-activated PpERF105 induces the expression of the repressor-type R2R3-MYB gene PpMYB140 to inhibit anthocyanin biosynthesis in red pear fruit.

item.title: SbMYB15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbMYB15 Gene Name: R2R3 type MYB15 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of a novel SbMYB15 from Salicornia brachiata confers salinity and dehydration tolerance by reduced oxidative damage and improved photosynthesis in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: SlMYB72
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07g055000 Gene Symbol: SlMYB72 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: ZmMYBC1;c1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb373660 Gene Symbol: ZmMYBC1 c1 myb1 Gene Name: colored aleurone1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.
